charges.charge_description: 21:846 Conspiracy to possess marijuana with intent to distribute. (1)

charges.charge_disposition: Deft is hereby placed on Probation for a term of Three (3) Years. Special Assessment of $50.00. (1)

charges.charge_description: Title 21:846 and 843(b) Knowingly and intentionally conspire to possess with intent to distribute a mixture or substance containing marijuana, and did knowingly and intentionally use a communication facility, to wit, the U.S. Mail, in facilitating the above-mentioned conspiracy. [1:95-m-125]
